hero.heading: The #1 TailwindCSS Gatsby Starter
hero.subheading: Build a reusable TailwindCSS library and ship it to all of your web touchpoints.
hero.content: Use the power of Rockin' Blocks to create a fully-customizable experience for your next web application. Powered by Gatsby and TailwindCSS, Rockin' Blocks components will save you time and money, allowing you to focus on the core of your application.

cta.heading: Code on the shoulders of giants.
cta.content: Manage your app, documentation, blog, components, and even all of your content in the same Git repository.

features.heading: TailwindCSS & Gatsby
features.content: Create your own reusable block library for all of your corporate touchpoints.
